{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT100 |revision= |upc=745883581894 |ean= |asin=B000WCUQ8W |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/13/2007 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRT100 |ic_id=3839A-WRT100 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT2780 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV320AB-70TCP |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S641632K-UC60 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 9-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, Gemtek type1 pinout |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2780 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2720 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt (leitec) |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1D:7E |oui_eth=00:1D:7E |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|RangePlus Wireless Router}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT100}} WRT100 serial numbers appear to start with '''MRX0'''. ==Additional external links== ===Firmware projects=== *[http://github.com/leitec/openwrt-leitec Supported by an unofficial fork of '''OpenWRT''' (''openwrt-leitec'')] ===Wikis=== *{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRT100_v1}} *{{WPLink|Linksys_routers}} ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=26267 On the '''DD-WRT''' Forums]
